meanings.definition: Pledged or bound to a certain course or policy
meanings.sent1: She is a committed student who always finishes her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: The team's committed effort led to their victory in the championship.
meanings.sent3: The committed squirrel diligently gathered nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: His committed belief in equality inspired many others to join the cause.
meanings.sent5: The committed firefighter bravely entered the burning building to save lives.

meanings.sent1: The criminal committed the robbery without thinking of the consequences.
meanings.sent2: She committed to memory all the important dates for the history exam.
meanings.sent3: The chef committed a culinary crime by adding too much salt to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist committed his vision to canvas, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The explorer committed to the dangerous journey across the desert.

meanings.definition: Dedicated or devoted to a cause or activity
meanings.sent1: He is a committed volunteer who helps at the shelter every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The committed doctor worked tirelessly to find a cure for the disease.
meanings.sent3: The committed gardener lovingly tended to her plants every day.
meanings.sent4: Her committed support for the charity raised awareness and funds.
meanings.sent5: The committed athlete trained hard every day to improve his skills.
